ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Really cool corpse locating tip
ygData.msgSnippet: Last time I used it was about 2 monthes ago in PoF and it worked fine.  One caution though, when using bind sight on something far away you will not always see
ygData.messageBody:
Last time I used it was about 2 monthes ago in PoF and it worked fine. One
caution though, when using bind sight on something far away you will not
always see all mobs/players that may be nearby your target.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 28, 2000 7:51 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Really cool corpse locating tip
>
>
> It definitly used to work. I havent tried in a long time.
> Its great went
> you go LD and die too, since you often dont know exactly
> where you died...
>
> Besides how could you question John Kim?
>
> > > >First you use Locating Lyric like you normally do. It'll
> > > >point you in the direction of the corpse, but more
> > > >importantly, it'll make the corpse your current target.
> > > >
> > > >Next you use Solidarity of Vision (L34) to bind sight to the
> > > >corpse. Switch to an external camera view, rotate around, and
> > > >usually you can tell from the surroundings exactly where the
> > > >corpse is. VERY useful for finding corpses in dangerous
> > > >sections of a dungeon, or if the corpse isn't where the person
> > > >thinks he died.
> > > >
> > > >--
> > > >John H. Kim
> > > >kim@...
>
>
